detail_desc: Single-breasted jacket in woven fabric with narrow notch lapels, a decorative buttonhole and two buttons down the front. Chest pocket, flap front pockets and two inner pockets, one with a button. Decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Slim fit that tapers at the chest and waist, which combined with slightly narrower sleeves creates a fitted silhouette. For the matching trousers, search on 0391750.
Non-wired triangle bra in microfibre and lace with moulded cups that give the bust a natural shape and light support. Wide fastening at the back with three pairs of hooks and eyes.
Wide jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with a V-neck and long dolman sleeves. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in supersoft, stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and narrow hems.
Short, fitted top in ribbed cotton jersey with short sleeves.
Short, fitted dress in soft organic cotton jersey with a round neck, long sleeves and gathered side seams for a more comfortable fit over the tummy.
Jacket in washed denim with a collar, buttons down the front, flap chest pockets with a button and welt side pockets. Buttons at the cuffs and an adjustable tab at the sides of the hem.
Long-sleeved, polo-neck jumper in a soft, rib-knit cotton blend.
Knee-length lace skirt with transparent lower sections and a zip in the side. Lined at the top.
Fitted, one-button jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, jetted front pockets and a single back vent. Lined.

Long blouse in a softly draping weave with a sheen. Collar, concealed buttons down the front and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Yoke with a pleat at the back, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Metal hoop earrings in various designs, one twisted pair and two pairs with decorative rhinestones. The zinc content of the earrings is recycled.

Baby Exclusive. Top in lightweight, patterned organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with a round neck that has a button at the back. Long raglan sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups at the cuffs and a gently rounded hem with short slits in the sides. Brushed inside.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Round-necked jumper in soft, loose-knit chenille yarn with a velvety-smooth finish. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and narrow ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Dungarees in soft, stretch denim with press-studs at the sides and straps with adjustable fasteners. Seam and belt loops at the waist, a fake fly, fake front pockets, real back pockets and elasticated hems. Press-studs at the crotch and down the legs in sizes 4-12M.
Long-sleeved blouse in crinkled chiffon with a frilled collar, and an opening at the back with ties at the back of the neck. Smocking and frills at the cuffs and hem.
Thong briefs in lace with a mid waist, lined gusset and string back.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.

Dungaree shorts in an airy organic cotton weave with buttons at the top and frill-trimmed straps that cross at the back. Frill trims down the sides of bib section, an elasticated seam at the waist and a lined lower section. Narrow elastication and a frill trim around the hems, and press-studs at the crotch.
Sleeveless dress in airy cotton seersucker with elastication at the top, narrow, double shoulder straps and a rounded hem. Unlined.

Lightly padded jacket in wind- and water-repellent functional fabric with a detachable, fleece-lined hood with a faux fur trim. Diagonal zip down the front and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Fleece lining. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Top in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Cigarette trousers in stretch twill with a regular waist that is elasticated at the back. Fake fly, diagonal side pockets, fake welt back pockets and ankle-length legs with creases.
Shopper in imitation leather with two handles and a magnetic press-stud fastener at the top. Unlined. Size 14.5x30x35 cm.
Tops in soft cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps.

Checked shirt in a cotton weave with a turn-down collar, classic front and open chest pocket. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, a yoke with a pleat and hanger loop at the back, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Long-sleeved dress in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with a detachable, braided imitation suede belt and a flared skirt.
Dungaree shorts in a soft cotton weave with press studs at the sides and adjustable straps with a press-stud at the front. Fake front pockets, a real back pocket and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Shorts in an airy viscose weave. High waist with wide, covered elastication at the back, pleats at the top, diagonal side pockets and wide legs.
Round metal earrings in various sizes and designs. One pair decorated with sparkly stones. Diameter approx. 2 cm, 4.5 cm, 5 cm, 5.5 cm and 8.8 cm.
Sleeveless romper suits in soft, organic cotton jersey with a kangaroo pocket, short legs and press-studs at the crotch. One with an all-over print.

Padded parka in cotton twill with a stand-up collar and detachable, pile-lined hood with a faux fur trim. Zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front, and flap chest and front pockets with a press-stud. Concealed drawstring at the waist and cuffs with a press-stud fastening. Lined.
Sleeveless blouse in a viscose crêpe weave with a V-neck, covered buttons down the front and a yoke with decorative gathers at the shoulders and back. Rounded hem, longer at the back.
Sleeveless dress in patterned slub cotton jersey with a small opening and button at the back of the neck, frills at the top, a gathered seam and flared skirt. Unlined.
Mules in textured imitation leather with satin linings and imitation leather insoles. Heel 1 cm.

Calf-length dress in a crinkled weave in a narrow, asymmetric cut at the top with a draped, wrapover front and concealed zip at the back. Gathered seam at the waist, and a flared, softly draping skirt. Lined.
Sleeveless dress in organic cotton jersey with a smocked seam at the waist and rounded hem.
Straight-cut coat in felted fabric with notch lapels, a concealed press-stud fastening at the front and side pockets. Lined.
Double-layered hat in a soft, fine knit.
Jersey body with high-cut legs, a low-cut back and narrow crossover shoulder straps. Seamless.
V-neck blouse in a sturdy weave with a crêpe finish. Short, wide sleeves, two concealed press-studs at the front and a detachable tie belt at the waist.
Short-sleeved sports top in airy, organic cotton jersey with slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Top in soft, printed jersey made from a viscose blend with dropped shoulders and short, wide sleeves with smocking and a flounce.
Pyjama bottoms in jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Sleeveless lace top with ribbing around the neckline and armholes and a scalloped hem. Unlined.
Long-sleeved tops in soft cotton jersey with a narrow trim around the neckline. Two printed tops and one in a solid colour.
Short-sleeved Henley top in cotton jersey with a round neckline and a button placket.

Knee-length dress in a crêpe weave with a V-neck and wrapover front with a concealed press-stud at the top. Long sleeves with a drawstring and frill trim at the cuffs and a narrow, elasticated seam at the waist. Longer at the back. Unlined.
Baby Exclusive. Long-sleeved tops in soft, ribbed organic cotton jersey with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder.
Top in softly draping silk with a V-neck, spaghetti shoulder straps and a straight hem.
V-neck top in cool, softly draping silk with adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps.
Top in sturdy jersey with a wrapover funnel collar with a drawstring. Kangaroo pocket, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Push-up bra in lace and microfibre with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.
Handbag accessory with a metal chain and carabiner hook and faux fur pendant in the shape of a rabbit. Polyester filling. Height 15 cm, width approx. 11 cm.
Blouse in a soft weave with a narrow collar, concealed buttons down the front, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem.
Short-sleeved jersey top with a motif.
Fancy dress cape in jersey with a concealed hook and loop fastening at the neck. Unlined.

Sandals in imitation leather with crossover foot straps that have glittery stars at one side, an adjustable ankle strap with a metal fastener, and a small loop at the back. Imitation leather insoles and fluted soles.
Trousers in an airy weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and tapered legs with elasticated hems.
Jumper in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend containing some wool with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Headband in a soft rib knit with an appliqué on the front. Width 9 cm.
Hairband in a soft weave with a bow at the front and covered elastic at the back.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend.
Hat in a soft, fine knit with appliqués. Text on the turned-up hem.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a wrapover hood, print motif on the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Leather sandals with square toes, narrow straps and covered heels. Adjustable heel strap with a metal buckle at one side. Leather insoles.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with a ribbed shaft.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft jacquard knit with a round neckline and low dropped shoulders. Tapered fit at the hem.
Ankle boots in grained imitation leather with pointed toes, block heels, elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Imitation leather linings and insoles and fluted soles. Heel 4.5 cm.
Fitted top in a fine rib knit with long sleeves and a ribbed neckline.
Jumper in a soft jacquard knit containing some wool with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved dress in woven fabric with a zip at the back and decorative sparkly stone detailing at the cuffs. Unlined.
Long-sleeved blouse in an airy cotton weave with lace-embroidered sections. Small stand-up collar, concealed buttons down the front and frills down the front that continue back over the shoulders.
CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Ribbed calf-length socks in nylon and recycled polyester.

Balconette bra in microfibre and lace with underwired, padded cups that lift and shape the bust and provide extra-firm support. Silicone trim at the top, detachable, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

Two-button jacket in a slub linen and wool weave with narrow notch lapels. Chest pocket, welt front pockets with a flap and three inner pockets, one with a button. Imitation suede elbow patches, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Partly lined. Slim fit that tapers at the chest and waist, which combined with slightly narrower sleeves creates a fitted silhouette.
Trainers with elasticated lacing at the top, a lightly padded edge and tongue, and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Short, wide top in soft, printed jersey with dropped shoulders and short, wide sleeves.
